Changelog
---------


0.1.1 (2012-04-11)
+++++++++++++++++++

* Fix: restore responses from response.history
* Internal refactoring (``MemoryCache`` -> ``BaseCache``, ``reduce_response``
  and ``restore_response`` moved to ``BaseCache``)
* ``connection`` option for ``MongoCache``


0.1.0 (2012-04-10)
+++++++++++++++++++

* initial PyPI release
